short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide unwanted Roblox games from your feed. Block games with one click and manage your blocked list easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing the same four games on the front page? Say goodbye to the clutter! This extension adds an X icon above games, letting you hide them permanently. It keeps a list that you may import/export, very simple.

Very useful for:
⦁	If you're sick of repetitive titles
⦁	Searching a term and going thru all games withthat word  e.x all games that have the word "catgirl" in them (not that i would do that)
⦁	To stop seeing the same games on the front page






ROBLOX GAME BLOCKER ROBLOX
